item.title: Nextjs Quick Start Walkthrough
item.description: mkdir hello-next cd hello-next git init npm init npm install --save react react-dom next mkdir pages "scripts": { "dev": "next", "build": "next build", "start": "next start } npm run dev /pages /api /public .next/ npm run build npm run start # start built server

item.title: About
item.description: About All contents are under CC BY 4.0. Details can be found through the link at the ending of each post. Me Was facinated by Python. Daily job involves Golang, JavaScript.

item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello World! Environment My previous blog platform: WordPress on BandWagon Host high maintainance cost: php, sqldb, virtual host vps is not free, though cheap Current: Hugo + Github free! Golang is promising. I’m learning it by doing it hugo new site [path] git clone [any hugo theme] hugo new posts/any.md hugo serve -D Deploy Using Github Actions
